00032 namespace pwiz {
00033 namespace analysis {
00034 
00035 
00036 /// writes table of spectrum metadata to a file
00037 class SpectrumBinaryData : public MSDataAnalyzer
00038 {
00039     public:
00040 
00041     struct Config
00042     {
00043         size_t begin;
00044         size_t end;
00045         bool interpretAsScanNumbers;
00046         size_t precision; 
00047 
00048         Config(const std::string& args = "");
00049     };
00050 
00051     SpectrumBinaryData(const MSDataCache& cache, const Config& config);
00052 
00053     /// \name MSDataAnalyzer interface
00054     //@{
00055     virtual UpdateRequest updateRequested(const DataInfo& dataInfo,
00056                                           const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity) const;
00057 
00058     virtual void update(const DataInfo& dataInfo, 
00059                         const Spectrum& spectrum);
00060     //@}
00061 
00062     private:
00063     const MSDataCache& cache_;
00064     const Config config_;
00065 };
00066 
00067 
00068 template<>
00069 struct analyzer_strings<SpectrumBinaryData>
00070 {
00071     static const char* id() {return "binary";}
00072     static const char* description() {return "write binary data for spectra i through j";}
00073     static const char* argsFormat() {return "i[-][j] [sn] [precision=d]";}
00074 
00075     static std::vector<std::string> argsUsage() 
00076     {
00077         std::vector<std::string> result;
00078         result.push_back("sn: interpret as scan number, not index");
00079         result.push_back("precision=d: write d decimal places");
00080         return result;
00081     }
00082 };
